title: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in pbj sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations under 400 kcal.
h1: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard PBJ: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added butter or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB/jelly brands, portion sizes, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PBJ sandwich contains about 390 kcal with 11 g protein and 47 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to whole wheat bread (2 slices)

faqs.q: How many calories in a PBJ sandwich?
faqs.a: About 390 kcal for a standard version with white bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a pbj sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 11 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PBJ sandwiches high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 15 g total sugars, mainly from jelly; opt for low-sugar versions to reduce.

faqs.q: How does whole grain bread affect PBJ calories?
faqs.a: It lowers calories by ~20 kcal and adds more fiber compared to white bread.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a pbj sandwich?
faqs.a: Around 20 g total fat, with 4 g saturated, primarily from peanut butter.
